    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Anthropology Subject Guide &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10295647">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10295647">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10295647">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding More
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10295647">
          <p href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2894875">
           For recommendations beyond the core resources listed on this page, use the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357826&amp;sid=2927042">
            Finding Background Information
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357826&amp;sid=2927046">
            Finding Articles
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357826&amp;sid=2927047">
            Finding Books
           </a>
           , and
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/aecontent.php?pid=353707&amp;sid=2894875">
           </a>
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=357826&amp;sid=2927048">
            Citations
           </a>
           tabs across the top.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10295647" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10267754">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10267754">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10267754">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10267754">
          <p>
           Find specific recommendations by course:
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10267754" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24948894">
              <a id="link_24948894" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/historicalecologylv" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948894,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948894});">
               Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10268289">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10268289">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10268289">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Articles and Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10268289">
          <div id="boxatt10268289" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12485167">
              <a id="link_12485167" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ant" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12485167,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12485167}); ">
               Anthropology Plus
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journals and books in anthropology, archaeology, and related fields.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12485958">
              <a id="link_12485958" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.anthrosource.net/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12485958,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12485958}); ">
               AnthroSource
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of mostly scholarly journal articles, as well as some books and non-scholarly articles published by the American Anthropological Association.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12486180">
              <a id="link_12486180" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12486180,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24636782">
              <a id="link_24636782" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24636782,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24636766}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10269306">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10269306">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10269306">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Resources for Finding Background Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10269306">
          <div id="boxatt10269306" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12486434">
              <a id="link_12486434" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12486434,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for anthropology. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488326">
              <a id="link_12488326" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/gvrl/infomark.do?type=aboutBook&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;eisbn=9781412979283&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;version=1.0" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488326,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488326}); ">
               21st Century Anthropology: A Reference Handbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Highlights the most important anthropology topics, issues, questions, and debates in the 21st century. Includes applied anthropology, archaeology and paleontology, sociocultural anthropology, evolution, linguistics, physical and biological anthropology, and primate studies.  Full text online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488252">
              <a id="link_12488252" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SDW" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488252,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488252}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Anthropology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,000 entries that focus on topics in physical/ biological anthropology, archaeology, cultural/social anthropology, linguistics, and applied anthropology. Also included are relevant articles on geology, paleontology, biology, evolution, sociology, psychology, philosophy, and theology.  Full text online.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10269318">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10269318">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10269318">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Citation Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10269318">
          <div id="boxatt10269318" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12488678">
              <a id="link_12488678" href="http://www.aaanet.org/publications/guidelines.cfm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488678,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488678}); ">
               American Anthropological Association Style Guide
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               General guidelines, as well as reference examples.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488789">
              <a id="link_12488789" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488789,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488789}); ">
               Citation Guides (Muhlenberg College)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of citation formatting in APA, Chicago, and MLA styles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12488740">
              <a id="link_12488740" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12488740,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Anthropology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Core Resources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373526}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources."  Download instructions and help available on the site.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
